text: d*@bar=y@hwA<MUN>h | '<HPA>SE<MUN>r hAyA<RBM>h 'El=miykAh<PAS> ham*o<MUN>raS@t*i<ZQP>y b*iyme<MER>y yw^otA<TEB>m 'AxA<MER>z y@xiz@qiy*A<TIP>h mal@ke<MUN>y y@hw*dA<ATN>h '<HPA>SEr=xAzA<MER>h `al=So<SIL>m@r<TIP>w^on wiyr<SIL>w*SAlA<SIL>im:
Sim@`w*<PAS> `am*i<MUN>ym k*ul*A<ZQP>m haq@Si<TIP>ybiy 'E<MUN>rEY w*m@lo'A<ATN>h* wiyhiy<TLP> '<HPA>donA<AZL>y y@hwi<MEH>h b*AkEm<PAS> l@`e<ZQP>d '<HPA>donA<TIP>y me<SIL>heyka<MER>l qAd@S<SIL>w^o:
k*i<SIL>y=hin*e<MER>h y@hwA<TIP>h yoYe<MUN>' mim*@qw^om<ATN>w^o w@yAra<MER>d w@dAra<TIP>k@ `al=bmwty (b*A<MER>m<HQA>tey) 'A<SIL>rEY:
w@nAma<MEH>s*w* hE<SIL>hAriym<PAS> t*ax@t*A<ZQP>yw w@hA<SIL>`<HPA>mAqi<TIP>ym yit@b*aq*A<ATN>`w* k*ad*w^onag<PAS> mip*@ne<MUN>y hA'e<ZQP>S k*@ma<TIP>yim mug*Ari<MER>ym b*@mw^orA<SIL>d:

b*@pE<MEH>Sa` ya<SIL>`<HPA>qob<PAS> k*Al=zo<ZQP>'t w*b@xaT*o<TIP>'wt b*e<MUN>yt yiW@rA'e<ATN>l mi<SIL>y=pE<MUN>Sa` ya<SIL>`<HPA>qo<RBM>b h<HPA>lw^o'<PAS> So<SIL>m@r<ZQP>w^on w*miy<PAS> b*Am<MUN>w^ot y@hw*dA<ZQP>h h<HPA>l<TIP>w^o' y@r<SIL>w*SAlA<SIL>im:
w@Wam@t*i<MER>y So<SIL>m@r<TEB>w^on l@`i<MER>y haW/*ׂAdE<TIP>h l@maT*A<MUN>`ey kA<ATN>rEm w@hig*ar@t*i<MEH>y lag*ay<PAS> '<HPA>bAnE<ZQP>yhA wi<SIL>ysodE<TIP>yhA '<HPA>gal*E<SIL>h:

w@kAl=p*@siylE<MUN>yhA yuk*a<RBM>t*w* w@kAl='Et@nan*E<AZL>yhA<PAS> yiW/*ׂA<SIL>r@p<MUN>w* bA'e<ZQP>S w@kAl=`<HPA>Yab*E<TIP>yhA 'AWi<MUN>ym S@mAmA<ATN>h k*i<TLM>y me<SIL>'Et@na<MEH>n zw^onAh<PAS> qib*A<ZQP>YAh w@`ad='Et@na<MER>n zw^onA<TIP>h yAS<SIL>w*bw*:

`al=zo't<PAS> 'Es@p*@dA<MUN>h w@'eyli<ZQP>ylAh 'e<SIL>yl@kA<MER>h W/yll (Sw^olA<TIP>l) w@`Ar<ATN>w^om 'E<SIL>`<HSE>WE<MEH>h mis@p*ed<PAS> k*at*an*i<ZQP>ym w@'e<TIP>bEl k*ib@n<MER>w^ot ya<SIL>`<HPA>nA<SIL>h:
k*i<MER>y '<HPA>nw*SA<TIP>h mak*w^otE<ATN>yhA k*iy=bA<AZL>'Ah<PAS> `ad=y@hw*dA<ZQP>h nAga<TEB>` `ad=Sa<MER>`ar `am*i<TIP>y `ad=y@r<SIL>w*SAlA<SIL>im:
b*@gat<PAS> 'al=t*ag*i<ZQP>ydw* b*Ak<TIP>w^o 'al=t*ib@k*<ATN>w* b*@be<MUN>yt l@`ap@rA<ZQP>h `ApA<TIP>r htplW/ty (hit@p*al*A<SIL>Siy):

`ib@ri<MER>y lAkE<TEB>m yw^oSE<MER>bEt SApi<TIP>yr `Er@yAh=bo<ATN>SEt lo<MEH>' yA<SIL>Y@'Ah<PAS> yw^oSE<MUN>bEt Ya<SIL>'<HPA>nA<ZQP>n mis@p*ad<PAS> b*e<MUN>yt hA'e<ZQP>YEl yiq*a<MER>x mik*E<TIP>m `Em@d*At<SIL>w^o:
k*i<SIL>y=xA<MER>lA<SIL>h l@T<TIP>w^ob yw^oSE<MUN>bEt mAr<ATN>w^ot k*i<SIL>y=yA<MEH>rad rA`<PAS> me'e<MUN>t y@hwA<ZQP>h l@Sa<TIP>`ar y@r<SIL>w*SAlA<SIL>im:
r@to<DAR>m ham*Er@k*AbA<TEB>h lArE<TIP>kES yw^oSE<MUN>bEt lAki<ATN>yS re'Si<AZL>yt xaT*A<MER>'t hiy'<PAS> l@bat=Yiy*<ZQP>w^on k*iy=bA<MER>k@ nim@Y@'<TIP>w* p*iS@`e<MER>y yiW@rA'e<SIL>l:
lAken<PAS> t*it*@ni<MUN>y Sil*w*xi<ZQP>ym `a<TIP>l mw^orE<MUN>SEt g*a<ATN>t b*At*e<MEH>y 'ak@ziyb<PAS> l@'ak@zA<ZQP>b l@mal@ke<TIP>y yiW@rA'e<SIL>l:
`o<RBM>d hay*oreS<PAS> 'A<MUN>biy lA<ZQP>k@ yw^oSE<TIP>bEt mA<SIL>reSA<ATN>h `ad=`<HPA>dul*A<MER>m yAb<TIP>w^o' k*@b<MER>w^od yiW@rA'e<SIL>l:
qAr@xi<MUN>y wAgo<ZQP>z*iy `al=b*@ne<TIP>y t*a<SIL>`<HPA>nw*gA<ATN>yik@ har@xi<MEH>biy qAr@xAtek@<PAS> k*an*E<ZQP>SEr k*i<MER>y gAl<TIP>w* mim*e<SIL>k@:
h<DAR>w^oy xo<SIL>S@bey='A<TEB>wEn w*po<MER>`<HPA>ley rA<TIP>` `al=miS@k*@bw^otA<ATN>m b*@'<MEH>w^or hab*o<AZL>qEr<PAS> ya<SIL>`<HPA>W<ZQP>w*hA k*i<MER>y yES=l@'e<TIP>l yAdA<SIL>m:
w@xA<SIL>m@d<MEH>w* WAdw^ot<PAS> w@gAzA<ZQP>lw* w*bAt*i<TIP>ym w@nAWA<ATN>'w* w@`A<SIL>S@qw*<PAS> g*E<MUN>bEr w*beyt<ZQP>w^o w@'i<TIP>yS w@na<SIL>x<HPA>lAt<SIL>w^o:

lAke<RBM>n k*o<YET>h 'Ama<MUN>r y@hwA<ZQP>h hin@ni<MER>y xoSe<TEB>b `al=ham*iS@p*AxA<MER>h haz*o<TIP>'t rA`A<ATN>h '<HPA><TLM>SEr lo<SIL>'=tAmi<AZL>ySw* miW/*.A<GER>m Yaw*@'ro<SIL>teykE<RBM>m w@lo<MEH>' te<SIL>l@kw*<PAS> rw^omA<ZQP>h k*i<TEB>y `e<MER>t rA`A<TIP>h hi<SIL>y':

b*ay*<AZL>w^om hah<GER>w*' yiW/*ׂA<DAR>' `<HPA>leykE<MUN>m mASA<RBM>l w@nAhA<AZL>h n@hi<MEH>y ni<SIL>h@yAh<PAS> 'Amar<PAS> SAd<MUN>w^od n@Sad*u<ZQP>nw* xe<MER>lEq `am*i<TIP>y yAmi<ATN>yr 'e<YET>yk@ yAmi<MUN>yS li<ZQP>y l@Sw^obe<MER>b WAde<TIP>ynw* y@xal*e<SIL>q:
lAken<PAS> lo<SIL>'=yi<SIL>h@yE<MUN>h l@kA<ZQP> maS@li<MER>yk@ xE<TIP>bEl b*@gw^orA<ATN>l b*iq@ha<TIP>l y@hwA<SIL>h:
'al=t*aT*i<TIP>pw* yaT*iyp<ATN>w*n lo<SIL>'=yaT*i<MUN>pw* lA'e<ZQP>l*Eh lo<MER>' yis*a<TIP>g k*@lim*<SIL>w^ot:

hE<SIL>'Am<MUN>w*r b*e<SIL>yt=ya`<HPA>qo<RBM>b h<HPA>qAYar<PAS> r<MUN>w*xa y@hwA<ZQP>h 'im='e<TIP>l*Eh ma<SIL>`<HPA>lAlA<ATN>yw h<HPA>l<MEH>w^o' d@bAray<PAS> yeyTi<ZQP>ybw* `i<TIP>m hay*ASA<MER>r hole<SIL>k@:
w@'Et@m<RBM>w*l `am*iy<PAS> l@'w^oye<MUN>b y@qw^ome<ZQP>m mim*<MUN>w*l Wal@mA<ZQP>h 'E<TIP>dEr t*ap@SiT<ATN>w*n me`o<SIL>b@ri<MUN>ym b*E<ZQP>Tax Sw*be<TIP>y mil@xAmA<SIL>h:
n@Se<MEH>y `am*iy<PAS> t*@gA<MUN>r@S<ZQP>w*n mib*e<TIP>yt t*a<SIL>`<HPA>nugE<ATN>yhA me`al<PAS> `o<SIL>lAlE<ZQP>yhA t*iq@x<MER>w* h<HPA>dAri<TIP>y l@`w^olA<SIL>m:
q<MUN>w*mw* w*l@k<ZQP>w* k*i<MER>y lo'=zo<TIP>'t ham*@nw*xA<ATN>h b*a<SIL>`<HPA>b<MER>w*r TA<SIL>m@'A<TEB>h t*@xab*e<TIP>l w@xE<MER>bEl nim@rA<SIL>Y:
lw*='i<GAR>yS hole<MER>k@ r<AZL>w*xa<PAS> wASE<MUN>qEr k*iz*e<ZQP>b 'aT*i<MUN>p l@kA<ZQP> lay*a<TIP>yin w@laW/*.ekA<ATN>r w@hAyA<MER>h maT*i<TIP>yp hA`A<MER>m haz*E<SIL>h:

'Aso<AZL>p 'E<SIL>'<HSE>so<GER>p ya<SIL>`<HPA>qo<MUN>b k*ul*A<RBM>k@ qab*e<MEH>Y '<HPA>qab*eY<PAS> S@'eri<MUN>yt yiW@rA'e<ZQP>l ya<MER>xad '<HPA>WiymE<TIP>n*w* k*@Yo<MUN>'n b*AY@rA<ATN>h k*@`e<AZL>dEr<PAS> b*@t<MUN>w^ok@ had*A<SIL>b@r<ZQP>w^o t*@hiymE<TIP>nAh me<SIL>'AdA<SIL>m:

`AlA<MEH>h hap*oreY<PAS> lip@neyhE<ZQP>m p*A<SIL>r@Yw*<PAS> wa<SIL>y*a`<HPA>bo<ZQP>rw* Sa<TIP>`ar way*e<MUN>Y@'w* b<ATN>w^o way*a<SIL>`<HPA>bo<MEH>r mal@k*Am<PAS> lip@neyhE<ZQP>m wa<SIL>yhwA<TIP>h b*@ro'SA<SIL>m:
wA<SIL>'oma<RBM>r Sim@`w*=nA'<PAS> rA'Se<MUN>y ya<SIL>`<HPA>qo<ZQP>b w*q@Yiyne<TIP>y b*e<MUN>yt yiW@rA'e<ATN>l h<HPA>l<MUN>w^o' lAkE<ZQP>m lAda<TIP>`at 'Et=ham*iS@p*A<SIL>T:
Wo<MER>n@'ey T<TIP>w^ob w@'o<MUN>h<HPA>bey r`h (rA<ATN>`) g*o<SIL>z@le<MEH>y `w^orAm<PAS> me<SIL>`<HPA>leyhE<ZQP>m w*S@'erA<TIP>m me`a<MER>l `aY@mw^otA<SIL>m:

wa<SIL>'<HPA>SE<MUN>r 'A<SIL>k@lw*<ZIN> S@'e<MUN>r `am*iy<AST> w@`w^orAm<PAS> me<SIL>`<HPA>leyhE<MUN>m hip@Si<ZQP>yTw* w@'Et=`aY@mo<SIL>teyhE<TIP>m p*iY*e<ATN>xw* w*pA<SIL>r@Ww*<PAS> k*a<SIL>'<HPA>SE<MUN>r b*as*i<ZQP>yr w*k@bAWA<TIP>r b*@t<MER>w^ok@ qal*A<SIL>xat:

'A<YET>z yiz@`<HPA>q<MUN>w* 'El=y@hwA<ZQP>h w@lo<MER>' ya<SIL>`<HPA>nE<TIP>h 'w^otA<ATN>m w@yas@t*e<AZL>r p*AnA<MEH>yw mehEm<PAS> b*A`e<MUN>t hahi<ZQP>y' k*a<SIL>'<HPA>SE<MER>r here<TIP>`w* ma<SIL>`al@leyhE<SIL>m:

k*o<YET>h 'Ama<MUN>r y@hwA<ZQP>h `al=han*@biy'i<TIP>ym ham*at@`i<MUN>ym 'Et=`am*i<ATN>y han*o<SIL>S@ki<MEH>ym b*@Sin*eyhEm<PAS> w@qA<SIL>r@'<MUN>w* SAl<ZQP>w^om wa<SIL>'<HPA>SEr<PAS> lo<SIL>'=yit*e<MUN>n `al=p*iyhE<ZQP>m w@qid*@S<MER>w* `AlA<TIP>yw mil@xAmA<SIL>h:

lAke<GAR>n la<MEH>y@lAh lAkEm<PAS> me<SIL>xAz<ZQP>w^on w@xA<SIL>S@kA<MER>h lAkE<TIP>m miq*@so<ATN>m w*bA<MEH>'Ah haW/*.E<AZL>mES<PAS> `al=han*@biy'i<ZQP>ym w@qAda<MER>r `<HPA>leyhE<TIP>m hay*<SIL>w^om:
w*bo<MUN>Sw* ha<SIL>xozi<RBM>ym w@xA<SIL>p@rw*<PAS> haq*o<MUN>s@mi<ZQP>ym w@`AT<MER>w* `al=WApA<TIP>m k*ul*A<ATN>m k*i<TEB>y 'e<MER>yn ma<SIL>`<HPA>ne<TIP>h '<HSE>lohi<SIL>ym:

w@'w*lA<RBM>m 'A<SIL>noki<GAR>y mAle<MEH>'tiy ko<AZL>xa<PAS> 'Et=r<MUN>w*xa y@hwA<ZQP>h w*miS@p*A<TIP>T w*g@bw*rA<ATN>h l@hag*i<MEH>yd l@ya<SIL>`<HPA>qob<PAS> p*iS@`<ZQP>w^o w*l@yiW@rA'e<TIP>l xaT*A't<SIL>w^o:

Sim@`w*=nA<MUN>' zo<RBM>'t rA'Sey<PAS> b*e<MUN>yt ya<SIL>`<HPA>qo<ZQP>b w*q@Yiyne<TIP>y b*e<MUN>yt yiW@rA'e<ATN>l ha<SIL>m@ta`<HPA>bi<MUN>ym miS@p*A<ZQP>T w@'e<MER>t k*Al=hay@SArA<TIP>h y@`aq*e<SIL>Sw*:
b*onE<MER>h Yiy*<TIP>w^on b*@dAmi<ATN>ym wiyr<SIL>w*SAla<TIP>im b*@`aw@lA<SIL>h:

rA'SE<MUN>yhA | b*@So<MUN>xad yiS@p*o<RBM>Tw* w@ko<SIL>h<HPA>nE<AZL>yhA<PAS> b*im@xi<MUN>yr yw^or<ZQP>w* w*n@biy'E<TIP>yhA b*@kE<MUN>sEp yiq@so<ATN>mw* w@`al=y@hwAh<PAS> yiW/*.A`e<MUN>nw* le'mo<ZQP>r h<HPA>l<MEH>w^o' y@hwAh<PAS> b*@qir@b*e<ZQP>nw* lo<SIL>'=tAb<MER>w^o' `Ale<TIP>ynw* rA`A<SIL>h:
lAken<PAS> b*ig@lal@kE<ZQP>m Yiy*<TIP>w^on WAdE<MUN>h te<SIL>xAre<ATN>S wiyr<SIL>w*SAla<AZL>im<PAS> `iy*i<MUN>yn t*i<SIL>h@yE<ZQP>h w@ha<MER>r hab*a<TIP>yit l@bAm<MER>w^ot yA<SIL>`ar:

w@hAyA<MUN>h | b*@'a<SIL>x<HPA>ri<MUN>yt hay*Ami<RBM>ym yi<SIL><TLM>h@yEh ha<MUN>r b*eyt=y@hwA<MEH>h nAkw^on<PAS> b*@ro<MUN>'S hE<SIL>hAri<ZQP>ym w@niW/*ׂA<MER>' h<TIP>w*' mig*@bA`<ATN>w^ot w@nA<SIL>h<HPA>r<MER>w* `AlA<TIP>yw `am*i<SIL>ym:

w@<SIL>hAl@k<GAR>w* g*w^oyi<MUN>m rab*i<RBM>ym w@'A<SIL>m@rw*<PAS> l@k<MUN>w* | w@na<SIL>`<HPA>lE<MUN>h 'El=har=y@hwA<RBM>h w@'El=b*eyt<PAS> '<HSE>lohe<MUN>y ya<SIL>`<HPA>qo<ZQP>b w@yw^ore<AZL>nw*<PAS> mid*@rAkA<ZQP>yw w@ne<SIL>l@kA<TIP>h b*@'o<SIL>r@xotA<ATN>yw k*i<MEH>y miY*iy*w^on<PAS> t*eYe<MUN>' tw^orA<ZQP>h w*d@bar=y@hwA<TIP>h miyr<SIL>w*SAlA<SIL>im:

w@SApa<RBM>T b*e<YET>yn `am*i<MUN>ym rab*i<ZQP>ym w@hw^oki<TEB>yxa l@gw^oyi<MER>m `<HPA>Yumi<TIP>ym `ad=rAx<ATN>w^oq w@kit*@t<AZL>w* xar@bo<SIL>teyhE<GER>m l@'it*i<RBM>ym wax<HPA>niyto<SIL>teyhEm<PAS> l@maz@mer<ZQP>w^ot lo<SIL>'=yiW@'<GAR>w* g*<MEH>w^oy 'El=g*w^oy<PAS> xE<ZQP>rEb w@lo<SIL>'=yil@m@d<MER>w*n `<TIP>w^od mil@xAmA<SIL>h:
w@yA<SIL>S@b<RBM>w* 'i<MUN>yS t*a<DAR>xat g*ap@n<TEB>w^o w@ta<MER>xat t*@'e<SIL>nAt<TIP>w^o w@'e<MUN>yn ma<SIL>x<HPA>ri<ATN>yd k*iy=pi<TEB>y y@hwA<MER>h Y@bA'<TIP>w^ot d*ib*e<SIL>r:
k*i<YET>y k*Al=hA<MUN>`am*i<ZQP>ym ye<SIL>l@k<ZQM>w* 'i<TIP>yS b*@Se<MUN>m '<HSE>lohA<ATN>yw wa<SIL>'<HPA>na<RBM>x@nw* nele<TEB>k@ b*@Sem=y@hwA<MER>h '<HSE>lohe<TIP>ynw* l@`w^olA<MER>m wA`E<SIL>d:
b*ay*<AZL>w^om hah<GER>w*' n@'um=y@hwA<RBM>h 'o<SIL>s@pAh<PAS> haY*o<MUN>le`A<ZQP>h w@han*id*AxA<TIP>h '<HPA>qab*e<ATN>YAh wa<SIL>'<HPA>SE<TIP>r h<HPA>re`o<SIL>tiy:

w@Wam@t*i<MEH>y 'Et=haY*o<SIL>le`Ah<PAS> liS@'eri<ZQP>yt w@han*a<SIL>h<HPA>lA'A<TIP>h l@g<MUN>w^oy `AY<ATN>w*m w*mAla<AZL>k@ y@hwA<MEH>h `<HPA>leyhEm<PAS> b*@ha<MUN>r Yiy*<ZQP>w^on me<SIL>`at*A<TIP>h w@`ad=`w^olA<SIL>m:
w@'at*A<MUN>h mig@d*al=`e<RBM>dEr `o<TEB>pEl b*at=Yiy*<TIP>w^on `AdE<MUN>ykA t*e'tE<ATN>h w*bA'A<RBM>h ham*Em@SAlAh<PAS> hAri<MUN>'SonA<ZQP>h mam@lE<TIP>kEt l@ba<MER>t y@r<SIL>w*SAlA<SIL>im:
`at*A<ZQM>h lA<MER>m*Ah tAri<TIP>y`iy re<ATN>`a h<HPA>mE<MUN>lEk@ 'e<SIL>yn=b*A<RBM>k@ 'i<SIL>m=yw^o`<HPA>Yek@<PAS> 'AbA<ZQP>d k*i<SIL>y=hEx<HSE>ziyqe<MER>k@ xi<TIP>yl k*ay*<SIL>w^oledA<SIL>h:

x<DAR>w*liy wAgo<TEB>xiy b*at=Yiy*<TIP>w^on k*ay*<SIL>w^oledA<ATN>h k*i<SIL>y=`at*Ah<TLP> te<SIL>Y@'i<AZL>y miq*ir@yA<GER>h w@SAka<MUN>n@t*@ b*aW/*ׂAdE<RBM>h w*bA<MEH>'t `ad=b*AbEl<PAS> SA<MUN>m t*in*AYe<ZQP>liy SA<YET>m yig@'Ale<MUN>k@ y@hwA<ZQP>h mik*a<TIP>p 'o<SIL>y@bA<SIL>yik@:
w@`at*A<TEB>h nE<SIL>'Es@p<MER>w* `Ala<TIP>yik@ g*w^oyi<MUN>m rab*i<ATN>ym hA'o<SIL>m@ri<MUN>ym t*E<SIL>x<HSE>nA<ZQP>p w@ta<MER>xaz b*@Yiy*<TIP>w^on `eyne<SIL>ynw*:
w@he<RBM>m*Ah lo<MEH>' yA<SIL>d@`w*<PAS> max@S@b<MUN>w^ot y@hwA<ZQP>h w@lo<MER>' hebi<TIP>ynw* `<HPA>YAt<ATN>w^o k*i<MER>y qib*@YA<TIP>m k*E<SIL>`Ami<MER>yr g*o<SIL>r@nAh:

q<DAR>w*miy wAd<MUN>w^oSiy bat=Yiy*<RBM>w^on k*i<SIL>y=qar@ne<GAR>k@ 'AWi<MEH>ym b*ar@zEl<PAS> w*par@sota<AZL>yik@<PAS> 'AWi<MUN>ym n@xw*SA<ZQP>h wa<SIL>h<HPA>diq*<TIP>w^ot `am*i<MUN>ym rab*i<ATN>ym w@ha<SIL>x<HPA>ram@t*i<MEH>y la<SIL>yhwAh<PAS> b*iY@`A<ZQP>m w@xeylA<TIP>m la<SIL>'<HPA>d<MER>w^on k*Al=hA'A<SIL>rEY:
`at*Ah<PAS> t*it@g*o<SIL>d@di<MUN>y bat=g*@d<ZQP>w*d mAY<TIP>w^or WA<MUN>m `Ale<ATN>ynw* b*aW/*.e<AZL>bET<PAS> yak*<MUN>w* `a<SIL>l=hal*@xi<ZQP>y 'e<TIP>t Sope<MER>T yiW@rA'e<SIL>l:

Sim@`w*=nA<ZQM>' 'e<MER>t '<HPA>SEr=y@hwA<TIP>h 'ome<ATN>r q<YET>w*m ri<MUN>yb 'Et=hE<SIL>hAri<ZQP>ym w@tiS@ma<MER>`@nAh hag*@bA`<TIP>w^ot qw^olE<SIL>kA:

`am*i<TEB>y mE<SIL>h=`AWi<MER>ytiy l@kA<TIP> w*mA<MUN>h hEl@'eti<ATN>ykA `<HPA>ne<MER>h bi<SIL>y:

`am*i<RBM>y z@kAr=nA'<PAS> mah=y*A`a<RBM>Y b*AlAq<PAS> mE<MUN>lEk@ mw^o'A<ZQP>b w*mE<SIL>h=`AnA<MER>h 'ot<TIP>w^o b*il@`A<MUN>m b*En=b*@`<ATN>w^or min=haW/*.iT*iym<PAS> `ad=hag*il@g*A<ZQP>l l@ma<ZQM>`an d*a<TIP>`at Yid@q<MER>w^ot y@hwA<SIL>h:

y<TIP>w^om lib@n<MUN>w^ot g*@derA<ATN>yik@ y<MER>w^om hah<TIP>w*' yir@xaq=xo<SIL>q:
